article.title: Known Issue: Login Problems Affecting iOS Users
article.body:
We have identified a login issue affecting iOS app version 425 on August 21, 2025. A fix has since been released in version 425.0.1.

If you were logged out of your account after updating to v425 and need help to regain access, please submit a support ticket via email to support@strava.zendesk.com. To help us verify your account, please include as much relevant information as possible.

Follow this article for updates.
